artist: Author: Jean-Antoine Lebrun-Tossa; Publisher: François Buisson
creditline:
The Minnich Collection
The Ethel Morrison Van Derlip Fund, 1966
description: Fashion periodical with a folded hand-colored engraving of two women in fashionable period dress (P.15,554) and two folded black and white engravings of music sheets with the score on the recto and verso of each sheet (P.15,556-P.15,559)
medium: Hand-colored engraving; engraved musical score; letterpress
portfolio: From Journal de la Mode et du Goût, ou amusemens du salon et de la toilette, Paris, 1790–92
title: Journal de la Mode et du Goût, Vingt-huitième Cahier, 25 Novembre 1790
